overview: Shari Farkas, Managing Partner Shari joined Acuity Solutions, LLC (then Wilson, Beers & Company) in 1991 and became a partner in 1996. She has helped hundreds of Las Vegas businesses understand and implement the most modern business tools available. Shari oversees all operations, marketing, sales, customer service and public relations for the company. A native Las Vegan, she has served the community in many ways. Shari is active with the Las Vegas Chamber of Commerce as a member of the Community Council Board of Directors 1999-2003, graduate of Leadership Las Vegas 2002, Chair/Co-Chair Community Achievement Awards 2002/2003, recipient of Las Vegas Chamber of Commerce Circle of Excellence Award and she serves on the Board of the Technology Business Alliance of Nevada and was the board president in 2006.
